meanings.definition: A small metal or plastic tube fixed tightly around each end of a shoelace.
meanings.sent1: I always struggle to thread the aglets through the tiny holes in my sneakers.
meanings.sent2: The aglets on my shoelaces keep them from fraying and unraveling.
meanings.sent3: When I tried to use aglets as tiny straws, they were too small to sip anything!
meanings.sent4: The aglets on my shoelaces are like little guardians protecting the ends.
meanings.sent5: The shiny aglets glinted in the sunlight, making my shoes look fancy.

meanings.definition: The metal or plastic tip at the end of a shoelace.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally stepped on one of the aglets and it hurt my foot.
meanings.sent2: The aglets on my new shoes are silver and match the eyelets perfectly.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the aglets were tiny swords and dueled with them in my imagination.
meanings.sent4: The aglets clicked against the floor as I walked, making a rhythmic sound.
meanings.sent5: I tied my aglets into knots to make my shoes look unique and stylish.
